form.official-title: To amend title XXVIII of the Public Health Service Act to eliminate the sunset of authority to make certain appointments for the National Disaster Medical System, and for other purposes.

section.header: Elimination of sunset of authority to make certain appointments for the National Disaster Medical System
section.text: Section 2812(c)(4) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300hh–11(c)(4)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking (A) In general.—If the Secretary determines and inserting If the Secretary determines; and
